radiographic_examinations.findings: 2 vegetations on the anterior leaflet of the tricuspid valve, the larger measuring 2.0 × 1.8 cm
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of vegetations on the tricuspid valve after several weeks of antibiotic therapy

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple vegetations on the tricuspid leaflets, the largest 2.5 cm × 1.5 cm, likely perforating the leaflet

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of the ST segment changes seen on initial presentation after intravenous antibiotic treatment
